english.segment1: I retreat. By myself at the back of my brain. I cannot see. What You're showing me through this pain. I have found. That I have found. Nothing for so long
english.segment2: (chorus). I don't understand. I don't need to. I know You've a plan. You will see through. It is in Your hands. I believe You
english.segment3: I say goodbye. I leave my loved ones far behind. I'm asking. Why is this is the story of my life. I have found. That I have found. Nothing for so long
english.segment5: I was only wondering. I've been trying to understand. I know there is more. So much more than I can see
